freesound_examples.note: These are example searches - you'll need a free Freesound.org account to download

public_domain_direct.note: These are direct links to public domain sounds that can be downloaded immediately

quick_setup_guide.step1: Visit any of the sources above
quick_setup_guide.step2: Download 7 short sound files (0.1-2 seconds each)
quick_setup_guide.step3: Convert to MP3 format if needed (use online converters like convertio.co)
quick_setup_guide.step4: Rename files to: select.mp3, pop.mp3, transfer.mp3, error.mp3, warning.mp3, victory.mp3, congratulations.mp3
quick_setup_guide.step5: Place all files in this /src/audio/ folder
quick_setup_guide.step6: Refresh the game page and test sounds

recommended_characteristics.select: Pleasant, soft click or chime sound
recommended_characteristics.error: Clear but not harsh error beep
recommended_characteristics.congratulations: Longer celebration sound or musical sequence
